item.title: Centre notifies scheme for funding PPP projects' development
item.description: Centre notifies scheme for funding PPP projects' development The IIPDF Scheme will aid the development of quality PPP projects by providing necessary funding support to the project sponsoring authorities

item.title: Indian Government receives dividends worth Rs 361 cr from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs)
item.description: Indian Government receives dividends worth Rs 361 cr from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) Secretary in the department of investment and public asset management (DIPAM) Tuhin Kanta Pandey tweeted the details on his official Twitter account.

item.title: Second largest cryptocurrency Ethereum's dominance in crypto market up 20% after the 'Merge'
item.description: Second largest cryptocurrency Ethereum’s dominance in crypto market up 20% after the ‘Merge’ The ‘Merge’ last month will create a more energy-efficient network based on the second largest cryptocurrency with a promise to save the environment.
